meta.title: Japanese Gojuon Learning Website
meta.description: Interactive Japanese Gojuon(50 Sounds) learning platform. Practice Hiragana, Katakana, Dakuten, Handakuten, and Yoon. Supports mouse, touch, and stylus writing. Features AI recognition. Deepen learning with listening exercises.
meta.keywords: Japanese Gojuon, Hiragana, Katakana, 50 Sounds, Japanese Learning, Japanese Pronunciation, Handwriting Practice, AI Recognition, Dakuten, Handakuten, Yoon, Japanese Teaching, Online Learning, Stylus
